oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MATHEMATICAL SIMULATION OF BOTTOM SEDIMENT MOTION BY WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kamphuis, J.W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mathematical simulation
bottom sediment
sediment transport
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A mathematical model is developed to calculate the amount of bottom sediment moved by wave action. The simplified case of a horizontal bottom and spherical material of uniform size is presented here; however, with some further groundwork it is thought that the model may be extended to actual field conditions without too much difficulty.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 10 (1966): Proceedings of 10th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Tokyo, Japan, 1966.; 43
